test.instr: (:ins (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X yellow) (sort Y chair))) (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X yellow) (sort Y washmachine))) (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X refrigerator))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (sort Y refrigerator))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X plant))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X blue))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X blue) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X white) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (putdown X) (:cond (sort X book) (color X green))) (:cons_notnot (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X green) (sort Y television)))) (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X chair)))) (:cons_not (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X book) (color X green)))) )
test.nl: There is a remotecontrol which is yellow on the chair. There is a bottle which is yellow in the washmachine. The door of the microwave is closed. The doof of the refrigerator is opened. Put a cup in the refrigerator. Go to the plant. Pick up the blue cup. Put the blue remotecontrol on the microwave. Put a book in the microwave. Put down the green book. The green cup must be on the television. Do not go to the chair. Do not pick up the green book.
